As we all fast and pray during Navratri, may we find inner strength, clarity, and purpose. Happy Navratri!28. Sending you warm wishes for a blessed and auspicious Navratri.29. May you find fulfillment in the divine energy of Goddess Durga. Happy Chaitra Navratri 2024!30. As you celebrate Navratri, may you be filled with love, positivity, and gratitude. Happy Navratri!31. May Goddess Durga bless you with strength and courage to overcome all obstacles in life. Happy Chaitra Navratri!32. May this Navratri bring joy, peace, and prosperity to all of us. Happy Navratri!33. Wishing you nine days filled with devotion, spirituality, and blessings. Happy Navratri!1. “There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.” ― J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone2. “Sometimes, the wicked will tell us things just to confuse us–to haunt our thoughts long after we've faced them.” ― Sarah J. Maas, Throne of Glass3. “I hope that real love and truth are stronger in the end than any evil or misfortune in the world.”― Charles Dickens4. “What if evil doesn't really exist? What if evil is something dreamed up by man, and there is nothing to struggle against except out own limitations? The constant battle between our will, our desires, and our choices?” ― Libba Bray, Rebel Angels5. “People couldn't become truly holy, he said, unless they also had the opportunity to be definitively wicked.”― Terry Pratchett, Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch6. “There is no denying that there is evil in this world but the light will always conquer the darkness.”― Idowu Koyenikan, Wealth for All: Living a Life of Success at the Edge of Your Ability7. “Goodness is something chosen. When a man cannot choose he ceases to be a man.”― Anthony Burgess, A Clockwork Orange8. “I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant.” ― Martin Luther King Jr.9. “No matter how hard Evil tries, it can never quite match up to the power of Good, because Evil is ultimately self-destructive. Evil may set out to corrupt others, but in the process corrupts itself.”― John Connolly, The Infernals10. “Evil cannot and will not be vanquished by evil. Dark will only swallow dark and deepen. The good and the light are the keenest weapons.”― Nora Roberts, Heaven and Earth11. "The battleline between good and evil runs through the heart of every man."- Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn12. "All humans realize they are loved when witnessing the dawn; early morning is the triumph of good over evil. Absolved by light we decide to go on." -Rufus Wainwright13. "Evil is the absence of good." - St. Augustine14. "Good and evil are eternal opposites. They are in continuous conflict, and neither can ever be completely destroyed." - Zoroaster15. "The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing." - Edmund Burke16. "The victory of good over evil is the victory of light over darkness, of knowledge over ignorance, and of love over hate." - Unknown17. “Light can devour the darkness but darkness cannot consume the light.”― Ken Poirot18. “Good wins in the end because evil is a self-destructive, cannibalistic force that Inevitably engorges upon itself.”― Ken Poirot19. “When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers, and for a time, they can seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall. Think of it--always.” ~ Mahatma Gandhi20. “When goodness removes itself, the space it occupies corrodes and becomes evil. ”- Gregory Maguire21. “Think good and good follows. Think evil and evil follows. You are what you think all day long.”- Joseph Murphy, The Power of Your Subconscious Mind22. ” Each human being shall have all of these in him, and they will constitute his nature. In some, there will be high and fine characteristics which will submerge the evil ones, and those will be called good men; in others the evil characteristics will have dominion, and those will be called bad men.”- Mark Twain, Letters from the Earth23. “There is but one good; that is God. Everything else is good when it looks to Him and bad when it turns from Him.”- C.S. Lewis, The Great Divorce24. “This is the thing about good and evil. They aren’t so far apart - and they often start from the same valiant place of wanting something to be different.”- Laura Dave, The Last Thing He Told Me25. "In the end, good always triumphs over evil because the light will always overpower the darkness." - Anonymous26. "Goodness is the true superpower that conquers all evil in the end." - Unknown27. "The victory of good over evil is not just a possibility; it's an inevitability." - Unknown28. "No matter how powerful evil may seem, it cannot withstand the strength of a united front of good-hearted individuals." - Unknown29. "Even in the darkest of times, the light of goodness shines brightest." - Unknown30. "Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light."- J.K. Article Title: Kapil Sharma: The Great Indian Kapil Show: Sunil Grover drops a selfie with Kapil Sharma as they travel together after 6 years, jokes 'Don't worry guys, it's a small flight'
Article Text:
Ranbir Kapoor reveals how he negotiated with Alia Bhatt's sisters and friends during joota chupai ceremony

Ace comedians Kapil Sharma and Sunil Grover are unrivalled in terms of comic timing that will leave you speechless! Whether it's their feud or their friendship , this team has the ability to make audiences laugh at everything. Kapil and Sunil once again made their fans laugh with a hilarious social media post.Kapil Sharma resorted to social media to mock their six-year-old argument, posting a picture with a humorous comment.Kapil and Sunil are seen in this snapshot taking a flight and sitting next to each other. They are both smiling as they pose for this photo. A glass of juice is placed between them. Kapil captioned the photo, "Don't worry guys, it's a small flight."This post went viral on social media like wildfire, and fans couldn't stop reacting to the incredible caption and photo. Fans, who are already overjoyed about Sunil Grover and Kapil's reunion , swamped the comment section of this post with humorous remarks. Not only fans, but many celebrities and well-known individuals praised Kapil and Sunil's sense of humor and responded to this post.Adah Sharma writes, "Sonu, drink mein boond sodium thiosulfate daal hi do.Taste ke liye." Gajraj Rao commented, "Love ju both of you," Rajiv Thakur responded, "Ha ha ha," and so on. Bharti Singh, Sana Sayyad, Suresh Raina, Yuvraj Singh, Badshah, Saqib Saleem, and many others responded to this article. This photo earned over 4 lakh likes within three hours of being posted.Sunil Grover and Kapil Sharma have worked together onThe Kapil Sharma Show . Sunil's character Guthi soared to quick recognition, and the comedian-actor gained a lot of attention and appreciation for playing it. However, when the squad left on an international trip, Kapil and Sunil had a heated argument on the plane. Following this, Sunil abruptly left the show.Since then, fans have been longing for the stars to collaborate again. Kapil and Sunil reconciled after six years and collaborated on their most recent show, The Great Indian Kapil Show . The show also stars Krushna Abhishek, Archana Puran Singh, Kiku Sharda, and Rajiv Thakur. It premiered on March 30, 2024, and fresh episodes will show at 8 p.m. every Saturday.
Article Summary:

Article Title: Swatantra Veer Savarkar box office collection: Randeep Hooda starrer to cross Rs 20 crore mark today
Article Text: Randeep Hooda 's dual role as an actor and director in ' Swatantra Veer Savarkar ', where he portrays Vinayak Damodar Savarkar , has received a lot of acclaim. Despite this, the film hasn't resonated with the audiences in comparison to other films like ' Article 370 ' and ' The Kerala Story ', which belong to the same genre Nevertheless, 'Swatantra Veer Savarkar', is all set to cross the Rs 20 crore mark at the box office on Sunday.This is going to be a very monumental feat for the film as its reported budget was Rs 20 crore.In the first week, the film minted Rs 11.35 crore and in the second week it added Rs 6.4 crore into its kitty, taking its two week collection to Rs 17. 75. 'Swatantra Veer Savarkar', on its third Friday, earned Rs 50 lakhs and on Saturday it showed a more than 100 percent hike to collect Rs 1.05 crore, reports Sacnilk. WIth these numbers, the collection now stands at Rs 19.20 crore. And going by the trend, the film is expected to cross Rs 20 crore mark today.'Swatantra Veer Savarkar', in its third week, will face competition from two big releases as 'Bade Miyan Chote Miyan' starring Akshay Kumar , Tiger Shroff and Prithviraj Sukumaran and Ajay Devgn 's 'Maidaan' are releasing on April 10.
Article Summary:
Randeep Hooda 's dual role as an actor and director in ' Swatantra Veer Savarkar ', where he portrays Vinayak Damodar Savarkar , has received a lot of acclaim.
'Swatantra Veer Savarkar', on its third Friday, earned Rs 50 lakhs and on Saturday it showed a more than 100 percent hike to collect Rs 1.05 crore, reports Sacnilk.
WIth these numbers, the collection now stands at Rs 19.20 crore.
And going by the trend, the film is expected to cross Rs 20 crore mark today.
'Swatantra Veer Savarkar', in its third week, will face competition from two big releases as 'Bade Miyan Chote Miyan' starring Akshay Kumar , Tiger Shroff and Prithviraj Sukumaran and Ajay Devgn 's 'Maidaan' are releasing on April 10.

Article Title: Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt hold hands and dance to 'Nadaan Parindey' at dinner party: WATCH
Article Text:
Watch: Leaked photos and videos offer sneak peek into 'Ramayana' ancient-style set design

Bollywood's power couple, Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt , spent their weekend catching up on some personal time together as they headed off on a date night. A viral video on social media, sees the star couple not holding back on the PDA as they danced together to the tunes of RK's ' Rockstar ' movie soundtrack ' Nadaan Parindey '.The couple hit headlines over the weekend when they were spotted taking their new car for a spin.While at first it was believed that the two were heading for a dinner date, a new video seemed to confirm their presence at a B-town party. Ranbir dressed in black, while Alia added a pop of colour in a colour-block dress.The clip doing the rounds online see RK and Alia holding hands as they swayed to Pritam crooning the track at the intimate gathering, attended by close friends and industry insiders. As soon as the clip went viral online, netizens couldn't help but gush over the duo's adorable chemistry.Ranbir and Alia squeezed in some personal time together amidst their busy work schedules. The actor is currently busy prepping up to shoot for Nitesh Tiwari's 'Ramayana', where he is set to play the role of Lord Ram. While filming has commenced, the actor has reportedly been busy attending workshops and getting ripped to portray the deity on-screen.Ranbir and Alia, were last seen together celebrating the festival of Holi with their daughter Raha and a few neighbours from their residential apartment. After working together on ' Brahmastra ', they will be seen together next in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's ' Love and War ' that will also see Vicky Kaushal in a leading role.

Article Title: Shraddha Kapoor joins Tamannaah Bhatia in endorsing laid-back Sundays as a must
Article Text:
Tamannaah Bhatia & Vijay Varma caught off guard by paparazzi after movie outing; react to 'Bhaiya-Bhabhi' calls

Amidst the chaos of our daily lives, even celebrities find solace in the simple joys of a lazy Sunday . Recently, Bollywood star Tamannaah Bhatia gave fans a glimpse into her relaxed weekend routine , showcasing her reluctance to part ways with her cozy bed.Known for her impeccable fashion sense and busy schedule, Tamannaah proved she's just like us when it comes to Sunday blues .In a candid Instagram post, she shared moments of her Sunday struggle, where the idea of a shower felt like an unwelcome intrusion into her day of rest.In the clips, Tamannaah hilariously expresses her aversion to bathing, humorously blaming her makeup artist for insisting on multiple showers a day. Her mother, joining in the banter, playfully likened her daughter's reluctance to that of a skunk, adding a touch of familial warmth and humor to the moment.Embracing her Sunday laziness, Tamannaah promised her friend to remove her makeup before snuggling into bed, ensuring her pillowcase remained pristine. The actress rounded off her cozy day with a heartwarming snapshot cuddling with her adorable dog, capturing the essence of relaxation and comfort. In the caption she wrote - “Should this be acceptable Sunday behaviour?”Her relatable Sunday antics garnered support from fellow actressShraddha Kapoor , who endorsed the idea of such laid-back Sundays as a necessary indulgence. The ‘Stree’ fame star commented - “This is compulsory Sunday behavior/”On the professional front, while Tamannaah continues to charm audiences with her on-screen presence, her upcoming projects, including 'Vedaa' and a song appearance in 'Stree 2,' promise to further showcase her versatile talent.
Article Summary:

Her mother, joining in the banter, playfully likened her daughter's reluctance to that of a skunk, adding a touch of familial warmth and humor to the moment.Embracing her Sunday laziness, Tamannaah promised her friend to remove her makeup before snuggling into bed, ensuring her pillowcase remained pristine.
The actress rounded off her cozy day with a heartwarming snapshot cuddling with her adorable dog, capturing the essence of relaxation and comfort.
In the caption she wrote - “Should this be acceptable Sunday behaviour?”Her relatable Sunday antics garnered support from fellow actressShraddha Kapoor , who endorsed the idea of such laid-back Sundays as a necessary indulgence.
The ‘Stree’ fame star commented - “This is compulsory Sunday behavior/”On the professional front, while Tamannaah continues to charm audiences with her on-screen presence, her upcoming projects, including 'Vedaa' and a song appearance in 'Stree 2,' promise to further showcase her versatile talent.

Article Title: Sara Ali Khan drops photos from her vacay time with Ibrahim Ali Khan, says she's a 'peace loving' person - PICS inside
Article Text: Post two back-to-back releases in the form of 'Murder Mubarak' and 'Ae Watan Mere Watan', Sara Ali Khan seems to be on a holiday to just get some peace and calm! The actress was busy with promotions of both these movies but Sara loves her travel time along with spirituality. She's now offered a glimpse into her vacay time where one can see Sara enjoying the sunset at the beach with brother Ibrahim.In another picture (which looks like a throwback picture), she is seen amidst snow clad mountains .She shared these photos and asked, "Are you a beach or mountain person?" further revealing, "I’m a sunset seeking, peace loving, safety searching, sibling needing kind of person @______iak______"Earlier on Sunday morning, Sara was spotted at the airport jetting off somewhere in a grey crop top and denim shorts. One also saw Ibrahim at the airport in a casual white shirt and loose track pants. However, Ibrahim's rumoured girlfriend Palak Tiwari was also spotted at the airport and fans thought that the duo have headed out together for a holiday.In the video doing the rounds on social media, Palak Tiwari is seen gracefully walking towards the airport gate, pausing to pose for the camera, radiating beauty in denim attire complemented by an overcoat. Fans on social media are speculating that the lovebirds are off for a vacation together.Now with Sara's post, one wonders if Ibrahim, Sara and Palak are together on a holiday! Palak and Ibrahim have been spotted together over dinners at several occasions but the duo have not yet confirmed their relationship!
Article Summary:
Post two back-to-back releases in the form of 'Murder Mubarak' and 'Ae Watan Mere Watan', Sara Ali Khan seems to be on a holiday to just get some peace and calm!
The actress was busy with promotions of both these movies but Sara loves her travel time along with spirituality.
One also saw Ibrahim at the airport in a casual white shirt and loose track pants.
Fans on social media are speculating that the lovebirds are off for a vacation together.Now with Sara's post, one wonders if Ibrahim, Sara and Palak are together on a holiday!
Palak and Ibrahim have been spotted together over dinners at several occasions but the duo have not yet confirmed their relationship!

Article Title: 'Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire' box office collection Day 10: Monsterverse saga maintains grip over Indian box office for second consecutive weekend
Article Text:
Maidaan - Official Trailer

' Godzilla x Kong ' extended its monstrous reign over the North American box office for a second weekend.The feature, which sees the enormous gorilla and reptilian giant set their differences aside and team up to save their species -- and ours -- took in an estimated Rs 6.25 Crore on Sunday, according to early estimates by sacnilk.com.The Monsterverse film took the number 1 spot at the Indian box office in its opening weekend and raked in a 7-day collection of an estimated Rs 57.75 crore.The film maintained its hold over the ticket windows, in its second weekend, earning Rs 3 crore on Friday. It saw good growth on Saturday and Sunday, recording collections of Rs 5.25 crore and Rs 6.25 crore respectively.Its second-week total stands at an estimated Rs 14.5 crore.'Godzilla x Kong' now has an estimated 10-day collection of Rs 72.25 crore, with its original English version scoring the highest collection of Rs 32.3 crore. It is followed closely behind by the Hindi dubbed version which earned an estimated Rs 20.65 crore. The Tamil version earned an estimated Rs 12.55 crore and the Telugu dubbed version earned Rs 6.75 crore.The film also scored the highest collection at the North American box office for a second weekend. The MonsterVerse mashup brought in $31.7 million over its second weekend. Directed by Adam Wingard, has thus far outperformed any of the studio’s recent monster films except for 2014's 'Godzilla'.The film which has been enjoying its time at the top of the Indian box office, will face stiff competition this week with the release of Akshay Kumar and Tiger Shroff 's ' Bade Miyan Chote Miyan ' and Ajay Devgn 's sports drama ' Maidaan ' that releases over the extended Eid holiday.
Article Summary:
It saw good growth on Saturday and Sunday, recording collections of Rs 5.25 crore and Rs 6.25 crore respectively.Its second-week total stands at an estimated Rs 14.5 crore.
'Godzilla x Kong' now has an estimated 10-day collection of Rs 72.25 crore, with its original English version scoring the highest collection of Rs 32.3 crore.
It is followed closely behind by the Hindi dubbed version which earned an estimated Rs 20.65 crore.
The Tamil version earned an estimated Rs 12.55 crore and the Telugu dubbed version earned Rs 6.75 crore.The film also scored the highest collection at the North American box office for a second weekend.
The MonsterVerse mashup brought in $31.7 million over its second weekend.

Article Title: Family Star Full Movie Collection: 'Family Star' box office collection day 3: Vijay Deverakonda and Mrunal Thakur starrer struggles to maintain momentum; collects Rs 3 crore on its first Sunday
Article Text:
Vijay Deverakonda wants to 'get married and become a father' amid dating rumours with Rashmika Mandanna. Deets inside

Vijay Deverakonda collaborated with director Parasuram Petla for the second time in his career after their 2018 successful hit ‘Geetha Govindam’. This recent collaboration, ‘ Family Star ’, featuring Mrunal Thakur as the leading lady, has completed three days in theaters since its release on April 5.According to sacnilk, the film collected an estimated Rs 3 crore in theaters on the first Sunday.This brought the box office total for the film to Rs 11.95 crores as of now. The Telugu occupancy rate was 26.94 percent, while the Tamil version had 19.83 percent.The total money it could collect on the first day was Rs 5.75 crore from Tamil and Telugu. However, later on, the film started facing a downfall in its numbers. Now, the fans association and producers of the film reportedly filed a complaint against some social media users who were targeting the actor and spreading negative comments about the film.Vijay was confident about his film receiving good responses, as the role he plays in the film is connected to the character of many real-life persons he has met and himself. He was also happy to work with Mrunal Thakur in this film.‘Family Star’ is a story of a middle-class man who is concerned about his family, which makes him short-tempered. But Mrunal’s character enters his life as his love interest and helps him respond to situations rather than react impulsively.

Article Title: Kiara Advani Plastic Surgery: When Kiara Advani had said that her plastic surgery rumours mentally disturbed her: ‘Main almost believe karne lagi’
Article Text: Kiara Advani has been riding high on the back-to-back success of her movies. The actress was last seen in ‘Satyaprem Ki Katha’ and before that she had ‘Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2’ and ‘JugJugg Jeeyo’. Kiara had once spoken about how upset she was when she attended an event and people started trolling her by saying she got a plastic surgery done which was not the truth.She further added on Arbaaz Khan’s show ‘Pinch’, “Main kisi event ke liye gayi thi, jo pictures bahar aaye on different social media platforms, there were a lot of comments about, ‘Oh, she has done plastic surgery.’ And the irony of it was main almost believe karne lagi ki maine kuch kiya hai apne aap ko.”Kiara had also spoken about it on Anaita Adajania’s show and said, “I remember I was at a clothing line launch. I did my own make-up, as I thought I am good at it. But I went overboard that day and in all my pictures, I could see two dollops on my cheeks. Maybe it was because of my high cheekbones or it was the highlighter. But everyone started saying that I had got botox done. It was so mean, that I started believing that something had changed on my face.”Kiara said that these rumours had affected her mentally as she started believing the same.On work front, Kiara will be seen next in ‘Game Changer’ with Ram Charan. The actress is also a part of ‘ Don 3 ’ with Ranveer Singh .
Article Summary:
Kiara Advani has been riding high on the back-to-back success of her movies.
The actress was last seen in ‘Satyaprem Ki Katha’ and before that she had ‘Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2’ and ‘JugJugg Jeeyo’.
But I went overboard that day and in all my pictures, I could see two dollops on my cheeks.
But everyone started saying that I had got botox done.
The actress is also a part of ‘ Don 3 ’ with Ranveer Singh .

Washing the clothes of all your family members can be one of the most time-consuming and difficult tasks for you if you do not have a washing machine. A washing machine is an automated appliance that comes with a special rotating mechanism that can wash and dry your clothes with almost zero human effort. With advanced technology taking over our lives, using these types of machines has become even easier. Determining the size of a washing machine you want to buy is of great importance. To make things simple for you, if you have a medium-sized family that consists of up to 4-6 members, then 8 kg washing machines can be a wonderful choice.With the introduction of automatic washing machines, you don't have to worry about shifting your clothes from one section to another. Unlike a semi-automatic washing machine, automatic washing machines are equipped with only one drum that can very efficiently wash your clothes, and after washing, they will automatically dry them. However, these automatic washing machines are enabled with several washing functions, through which you can decide the type of operation you want to perform. If you don’t want to dry your clothes inside the machine, then you can choose the wash-only function, whereas if you have hand-washed your clothes and you only want to dry them in the machine, then the dry mode will be very effective. Apart from these, automatic washing machines are equipped with several other features as well.User Feedback: Customers are all praises about this fully automatic washing machine from Electrolux. They are very satisfied with its wash quality and especially praise it for the way it handles delicate fabrics.User Feedback: People like the washer-dryer pair because it's cheap, uses little energy, and doesn't vibrate. They say it's the best washing machine in this price range, that it saves money and power, and that it doesn't make a lot of noise or shake.User Feedback: The 8 kg capacity of this washing machine from Samsung is ideal for medium to large families, allowing us to wash heavier clothes such as blankets and sheets without difficulty. The 5-star power supply ensures that the machine performs smoothly and efficiently, saving both energy and money over time.User Feedback: Users are pleased with the washer-dryer performance, build quality, value, noise level, and ease of installation. They say that it uses relatively less water while still offering high-quality washing. Article Title: ‘Ullamarinjavale’ song from ‘Turkish Tharkkam’ is out!
Article Text:
Ullamarinjavale - Lyric Video | Turkish Tharkkam | Lukman Avaran,Amina Nijam | Ifthi |Nawaz Sulaiman

Aavesham | Song - Illuminati

If you are a music enthusiast, deeply missing the charm of the Malayalam songs from the 1990s and 2000s, you are in for a treat. The makers of the upcoming film ‘ Turkish Tharkkam ’ have dropped a song titled ‘ Ullamarinjavale ’.Composed by Ifthi , the delightful romantic number is penned by Vinayak Sasikumar . The beautiful song is sung by Arun Alat .The team launched the song on social media and said, “Ready to immerse yourself in the soulful melodies of "Ullamarinjavale" Song from "Turkish Tharkkam".Sung by Arun Alat, Lyrics Written by Vinayak Sasikumar, Music Composed by Ifthi. Hit the play button now and let the music speak to your soul.”Check out the video here.‘Turkish Tharkkam’ is written and directed by Nawaz Sulaiman. The film has Sunny Wayne, and Lukman Avaran in the lead roles. The film also has actors Amina Nijam, Anagha Narayanan, Harisree Ashokan, Dayyana Hameed, Sujith Shankar, Assim Jamal, Jayasree Shivadas, Sreerekha, Jolly Chirayath, and, Raventhra Jayan in the supporting roles.On the technical front, the cinematography is done by Abdul Rahim. The editing department is done by Noufal Abdullah. The sound design is done by Jibin S. The sound mix is done by Shibin N. Bilal is the DI colorist. Jayan Crayons is in charge of the art director. The costume design is done by Manjusha Radhakrishna.

Article Title: Ram Charan lauds Siddhu Jonnalagadda for 'Tillu Square' success
Article Text: ' Tillu Square ', featuring Siddhu Jonnalagadda and Anupama Parameshwaran in lead roles, has emerged as a massive success. The film hit the big screens on March 29. It's not just the fans who are enjoying the film, even the industry insiders like Ram Charan have praised the film's success.Ram Charan, known for his role in ' RRR ,' took to X to congratulate Siddhu's remarkable success.He congratulated Siddhu, Anupama, director Mallik Ram , and the entire team for their achievement.He wrote, "Dear Siddhu, so proud of your phenomenal success. My heartfelt congratulations to Anupama, Mallik Ram, the music directors, Sithara Entertainments, and the entire team on this success.".The movie is the sequel to the 2022 hit, ' Dj Tillu ,' where Siddhu's character Tillu falls in love with a new character named Lily. The film takes viewers on a journey filled with adventure and hilarious moments, with Siddhu's witty dialogues and humour adding to its charm. Siddhu is also highly praised for his dialogue timings and punch lines, which made fans fall in love with his character Tillu in the prequel.The prequel, 'Dj Tillu,' had already set high expectations, and 'Tillu Square' managed to meet and even surpass them, entering the prestigious Rs 100-crore club .
Article Summary:
' Tillu Square ', featuring Siddhu Jonnalagadda and Anupama Parameshwaran in lead roles, has emerged as a massive success.
My heartfelt congratulations to Anupama, Mallik Ram, the music directors, Sithara Entertainments, and the entire team on this success.
".The movie is the sequel to the 2022 hit, ' Dj Tillu ,' where Siddhu's character Tillu falls in love with a new character named Lily.

Article Title: Educator Anand Kumar Launches 'Super 10 Scholar' Programme with JK Lakshmipat University
Article Text: JAIPUR: Prominent educator Anand Kumar , known for his Super 30 programme, on Tuesday announced the ' Super 10 Scholar ' list in partnership with JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU), an initiative of J.K. Organisation.As part of the partnership, Kumar will hand-pick 10 exceptional students who will be supported by JKLU for their undergraduate studies.The students will receive a comprehensive scholarship covering tuition fees and expenses for a 4-year B.Tech programme in Computer Science at JKLU if they meet the minimum eligibility criteria and other prerequisites."In crafting the 'Super 10 Scholar' initiative, we aim to replicate the transformative impact witnessed through the 'Super 30' programme,” said Kumar, a recipient of the Padma Shri Award.“Just as 'Super 30' has empowered countless underprivileged students to excel in engineering, I believe the 'Super 10 Scholar' list will be a beacon of opportunity for these bright young minds. JKLU's commitment to nurturing the next generation of engineers is commendable and I'm honoured to be part of this initiative that will shape the future of our nation's technological landscape," he added.Kumar, whose life as a mathematics teacher and his educational programme of the 'Super 30' was captured in a biographical drama of the same name in 2019, encouraged students to pursue their dream of studying at the prestigious Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs) without succumbing to overwhelming pressure."While clearing the JEE may not be feasible for everyone, there are always alternative pathways that can help you accomplish your dreams of studying at esteemed institutions like the IITs," Kumar noted.Kumar also encouraged students to approach their studies “with passion and determination, emphasising that success encompasses more than just exam scores; it also requires perseverance and a thirst for knowledge.”
Article Summary:
JAIPUR: Prominent educator Anand Kumar , known for his Super 30 programme, on Tuesday announced the ' Super 10 Scholar ' list in partnership with JK Lakshmipat University (JKLU), an initiative of J.K. Organisation.As part of the partnership, Kumar will hand-pick 10 exceptional students who will be supported by JKLU for their undergraduate studies.The students will receive a comprehensive scholarship covering tuition fees and expenses for a 4-year B.Tech programme in Computer Science at JKLU if they meet the minimum eligibility criteria and other prerequisites.
"In crafting the 'Super 10 Scholar' initiative, we aim to replicate the transformative impact witnessed through the 'Super 30' programme,” said Kumar, a recipient of the Padma Shri Award.“Just as 'Super 30' has empowered countless underprivileged students to excel in engineering, I believe the 'Super 10 Scholar' list will be a beacon of opportunity for these bright young minds.
JKLU's commitment to nurturing the next generation of engineers is commendable and I'm honoured to be part of this initiative that will shape the future of our nation's technological landscape," he added.Kumar, whose life as a mathematics teacher and his educational programme of the 'Super 30' was captured in a biographical drama of the same name in 2019, encouraged students to pursue their dream of studying at the prestigious Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs) without succumbing to overwhelming pressure.
"While clearing the JEE may not be feasible for everyone, there are always alternative pathways that can help you accomplish your dreams of studying at esteemed institutions like the IITs," Kumar noted.Kumar also encouraged students to approach their studies “with passion and determination, emphasising that success encompasses more than just exam scores; it also requires perseverance and a thirst for knowledge.”

Article Title: Asus India opens pre-booking for Zenbook Duo OLED laptop: 2-year warranty extension, Asus ProArt Mouse, and more for Rs 1
Article Text: Asus has announced pre-booking offers for its upcoming dual-screen laptop, the Zenbook Duo OLED (UX8406MA). The pre-booking period will run from April 9 to April 15, 2024, and customers can take advantage of exclusive offers worth INR 20,398 for just Rs 1. The offer includes a 2-year warranty extension , 3 years of local accidental damage protection, and an Asus ProArt Mouse (MD300).The Zenbook Duo OLED is set to revolutionize the dual-screen laptop market with its twin 14" FHD+ 60Hz OLED touchscreens, providing users with an enhanced visual workspace for seamless multitasking. The laptop also features a detachable full-size keyboard and a built-in kickstand, making it an ideal companion for professionals on the go.Powered by an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor and equipped with ample RAM and storage, the Zenbook Duo OLED promises unmatched performance in a sleek, lightweight package. The all-metal design weighs just 1.35 kg, ensuring both portability and durability.Customers can pre-book the Zenbook Duo OLED at Asus Exclusive Stores, Asus eSHOP, Flipkart , and Amazon to avail the exclusive offer. The laptop is expected to be made available shortly after the pre-booking period ends, with official pricing and availability to be announced at a later date.
Article Summary:
Asus has announced pre-booking offers for its upcoming dual-screen laptop, the Zenbook Duo OLED (UX8406MA).
The pre-booking period will run from April 9 to April 15, 2024, and customers can take advantage of exclusive offers worth INR 20,398 for just Rs 1.
The offer includes a 2-year warranty extension , 3 years of local accidental damage protection, and an Asus ProArt Mouse (MD300).The Zenbook Duo OLED is set to revolutionize the dual-screen laptop market with its twin 14" FHD+ 60Hz OLED touchscreens, providing users with an enhanced visual workspace for seamless multitasking.
The all-metal design weighs just 1.35 kg, ensuring both portability and durability.Customers can pre-book the Zenbook Duo OLED at Asus Exclusive Stores, Asus eSHOP, Flipkart , and Amazon to avail the exclusive offer.
The laptop is expected to be made available shortly after the pre-booking period ends, with official pricing and availability to be announced at a later date.

Article Title: Bigg Boss Malayalam 6: Abhishek Sreekumar accuses inmate Abhishek Jayadeep of representing a community that does 'bad things' in society
Article Text: The much-anticipated clash between wildcard entrants Abhishek Jayadeep and Abhishek Sreekumar has finally erupted in the Bigg Boss Malayalam 6 house. Fans had been anticipating friction between the gay model and the influencer known for his anti-LGBTQ stance, and their confrontation did not disappoint.During the nomination process, tensions escalated as Abhishek Sreekumar nominated Abhishek Jayadeep, citing derogatory remarks about the LGBTQ community ."I am nominating him because he is the representative of a community that does bad things in society," declared Abhishek Sreekumar. He further alleged that Jayadeep's community targets families, especially women and children.The influencer's comments sent shockwaves through the house, prompting several other contestants to nominate him for his divisive remarks. During the nomination, Jaanmoni Das , transgender makeup artist confronted Abhishek Sreekumar for making an offensive statement about her community. She nominates him stating that he doesn't qualify to continue in the game.Later, Abhishek Sreekumar addressed the housemates, attempting to clarify his stance. "I am not against homosexual or transgender individuals who choose their partners and live their lives," he asserted. "I am against people who use their identity to disrupt families."Abhishek Jayadeep appeared taken aback by the accusations leveled against him. However, rather than engaging in further confrontation, the housemates chose to exit the discussion, leaving the issue unresolved.Earlier in the episode, Abhishek Sreekumar also landed in controversy by making a comment on Abhishek Jayadeep's middle name.
Article Summary:
The much-anticipated clash between wildcard entrants Abhishek Jayadeep and Abhishek Sreekumar has finally erupted in the Bigg Boss Malayalam 6 house.
"I am nominating him because he is the representative of a community that does bad things in society," declared Abhishek Sreekumar.
During the nomination, Jaanmoni Das , transgender makeup artist confronted Abhishek Sreekumar for making an offensive statement about her community.
She nominates him stating that he doesn't qualify to continue in the game.Later, Abhishek Sreekumar addressed the housemates, attempting to clarify his stance.
"Abhishek Jayadeep appeared taken aback by the accusations leveled against him.

Article Title: As a British citizen, I’m proud ...., says Mustafa Suleyman, in his first blog as CEO of Microsoft AI
Article Text:
Read Mustafa Suleyman's message here

“Microsoft recently announced the creation of Microsoft AI, a newly formed organisation to help advance our consumer AI products and research, including Copilot. Building on that news, I’m thrilled to share that Microsoft AI is opening a new AI hub in the heart of London. Microsoft AI London will drive pioneering work to advance state-of-the-art language models and their supporting infrastructure, and to create world-class tooling for foundation models, collaborating closely with our AI teams across Microsoft and with our partners, including OpenAI.

The new AI hub will be led by

Jordan Hoffmann

, an exceptional AI scientist and engineer. Prior to joining Microsoft AI, Hoffmann distinguished himself as an AI pioneer at Inflection and DeepMind, based in London. Hoffmann will be joined by a talented group of Microsoft AI team members based in our London Paddington office.

There is an enormous pool of AI talent and expertise in the UK and Microsoft AI plans to make a significant, long-term investment in the region as we begin hiring the best AI scientists and engineers for this new AI hub.

In the coming weeks and months, we will be posting job openings and actively hiring exceptional individuals who want to work on the most interesting and challenging AI questions of our time. We’re looking for new team members who are driven by impact at scale, and who are passionate innovators eager to contribute to a team culture where continuous learning is the norm.

This is great news for Microsoft AI and for the UK. As a British citizen, born and raised in London, I’m proud to have co-founded and built a cutting-edge AI business here. I’m deeply aware of the extraordinary talent pool and AI ecosystem in the UK, and I’m excited to make this commitment to the UK on behalf of Microsoft AI. I know – through my close work with thought leaders in the UK government, the business community and academia – that the country is committed to advancing AI responsibly and with a safety-first commitment to drive investment, innovation and economic growth. Our decision to open this hub in the UK reflects this ambition.

The Microsoft AI London hub adds to Microsoft’s existing presence in the UK, including the Microsoft Research Cambridge lab, home to some of the foremost researchers in the areas of AI, cloud and productivity. At the same time, it builds off Microsoft’s recently announced £2.5 billion investment to upskill the UK workforce for the AI era and to build the infrastructure to power the AI economy, including our commitment to bring 20,000 of the most advanced GPUs to the country by 2026.

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to push the boundaries of what’s possible with AI and extend the benefits to every person and organisation across the UK.”

Former Google DeepMind co-founder Mustafa Suleyman recently took over as Microsoft AI CEO. Suleyman co-founded the AI research lab DeepMind in the UK, which was bought by Google in 2014. He also launched his own AI start-up, Inflection AI , in 2022, before joining Microsoft in March. Microsoft is opening a new office in London dedicated to artificial intelligence (AI) research and development, Suleyman announced the same in his first blog as the company's CEO.He wrote that Microsoft AI London will drive work to advance state-of-the-art language models and their supporting infrastructure. "This AI hub is also expected to create advanced tooling for foundation models as it will collaborate closely with AI teams across Microsoft and its partners, including ChatGPT maker OpenAI ," he wrote. Here's Mustafa Suleyman's first blog as CEO of Microsoft AI:
Article Summary:
Read Mustafa Suleyman's message here“Microsoft recently announced the creation of Microsoft AI, a newly formed organisation to help advance our consumer AI products and research, including Copilot.
Building on that news, I’m thrilled to share that Microsoft AI is opening a new AI hub in the heart of London.
The new AI hub will be led byJordan Hoffmann, an exceptional AI scientist and engineer.
As a British citizen, born and raised in London, I’m proud to have co-founded and built a cutting-edge AI business here.
Here's Mustafa Suleyman's first blog as CEO of Microsoft AI:

Article Title: For Himachal Assembly by-elections, Congress forms six teams
Article Text: SHIMLA: Facing the challenge of retaining its government by winning adequate seats to remain in the majority, the ruling Congress has started making serious efforts to win the by-elections on 6 Assembly seats where BJP has given tickets to Congress rebels. Congress leadership has deputed ministers to each assembly seat for the by-elections to carry forward its campaign in a more effective manner.Congress has yet to find the candidates for the by-elections but it already has started fortifying the assembly seats where by-elections will be held on June 1 and for this seven ministers have been assigned the responsibilities along with 27 other office bearers of the party.With the approval of AICC incharge for state, Rajeev Shukla, state party president Pratibha Singh has assigned the assembly wise election duties among the ministers, chief parliamentary secretaries (CPS), MLAs and Congress office bearers. Six Assembly seats where by-elections will be held includes Dharamshala, Lahaul-Spiti, Sujanpur, Barsar, Gagret and Kutlehar. These teams have been entrusted with the responsibility of campaigning.For Dharamshala assembly seats, Agriculture Minister Chander Kumar has been made the incharge and along with him CM Ashish Butail, HPTDC chairman R S Bali, deputy chief whip Kewal Pathania, DCC president Karan Pathania and block president Harbhajan Chaudhary have been attached.Industries Minister Harshwaradhan Chauhan has been made incharge of Gagret assembly constituency and along with him MLAs including Malender Rajan and Sudarshan Babloo beside DCC president Ranjeet Rana and block president Surinder Kanwar have been attached.For the Kutlehar assembly seat, the Congress party had made two ministers including education minister Rohit Thakur and rural development minister Anirudh Singh incharge and along with them MLAs including Bhawani Singh Pathania and Neeraj Naiyar, DCC president Ranjeet Rana and working block president Vivek Minka have been attached.Revenue Minister Jagat Singh Negi has been given command in Lahaul-Spiti and his team includes CPS Sundar Singh Thakur, MLA Bhuvaneshwar Gaur, DCC president Gyalsen Thakur, BCC presidents including Ram Singh of Kaza, Ramesh Kumar of Keylong and Devi Singh Thakur of Udaipur.For the Sujanpur assembly seat, a team has been formed in under the leadership of Ayurveda Minister Yadavinder Goma and MLAs including Chander Shekhar and Suresh Kumar beside DCC president Surender Bharti and working BCC president Rajender Verma have been attached with him.The reins of Badsar assembly seat has been given to Technical Education minister Rajesh Dharmani and CPS Kishori Lal, MLA Sanjay Ratan, DCC president Suman Bharti and working BCC president Sanjay Sharma have been attached with him.
Article Summary:
SHIMLA: Facing the challenge of retaining its government by winning adequate seats to remain in the majority, the ruling Congress has started making serious efforts to win the by-elections on 6 Assembly seats where BJP has given tickets to Congress rebels.
Congress leadership has deputed ministers to each assembly seat for the by-elections to carry forward its campaign in a more effective manner.Congress has yet to find the candidates for the by-elections but it already has started fortifying the assembly seats where by-elections will be held on June 1 and for this seven ministers have been assigned the responsibilities along with 27 other office bearers of the party.With the approval of AICC incharge for state, Rajeev Shukla, state party president Pratibha Singh has assigned the assembly wise election duties among the ministers, chief parliamentary secretaries (CPS), MLAs and Congress office bearers.
Six Assembly seats where by-elections will be held includes Dharamshala, Lahaul-Spiti, Sujanpur, Barsar, Gagret and Kutlehar.
These teams have been entrusted with the responsibility of campaigning.For Dharamshala assembly seats, Agriculture Minister Chander Kumar has been made the incharge and along with him CM Ashish Butail, HPTDC chairman R S Bali, deputy chief whip Kewal Pathania, DCC president Karan Pathania and block president Harbhajan Chaudhary have been attached.Industries Minister Harshwaradhan Chauhan has been made incharge of Gagret assembly constituency and along with him MLAs including Malender Rajan and Sudarshan Babloo beside DCC president Ranjeet Rana and block president Surinder Kanwar have been attached.For the Kutlehar assembly seat, the Congress party had made two ministers including education minister Rohit Thakur and rural development minister Anirudh Singh incharge and along with them MLAs including Bhawani Singh Pathania and Neeraj Naiyar, DCC president Ranjeet Rana and working block president Vivek Minka have been attached.Revenue Minister Jagat Singh Negi has been given command in Lahaul-Spiti and his team includes CPS Sundar Singh Thakur, MLA Bhuvaneshwar Gaur, DCC president Gyalsen Thakur, BCC presidents including Ram Singh of Kaza, Ramesh Kumar of Keylong and Devi Singh Thakur of Udaipur.For the Sujanpur assembly seat, a team has been formed in under the leadership of Ayurveda Minister Yadavinder Goma and MLAs including Chander Shekhar and Suresh Kumar beside DCC president Surender Bharti and working BCC president Rajender Verma have been attached with him.The reins of Badsar assembly seat has been given to Technical Education minister Rajesh Dharmani and CPS Kishori Lal, MLA Sanjay Ratan, DCC president Suman Bharti and working BCC president Sanjay Sharma have been attached with him.

Article Title: Salman Khan dashingly ignores Orry's signature pose at Anant Ambani's birthday bash in Jamnagar - See photo
Article Text:
Check out the photo here:

Amid viral video of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant with 20 security cars at Dubai mall; Salman Khan, Orry, Shikhar Pahariya and others arrive in Jamnagar for Anant's birthday bash

Salman Khan and Orry posed for a photo together at Anant Ambani 's birthday celebration in Jamnagar . However, Salman appeared to avoid mimicking Orry's signature pose during the photo op.An Instagram fan page unveiled an exclusive snapshot from the recent birthday festivities of Anant Ambani in Jamnagar, Gujarat. The image features Bollywood icon Salman Khan exuding charm in a stylish ensemble: a sleek black full-sleeved t-shirt paired with denim jeans.With hands casually tucked in his pockets, Khan gazes away from the camera, epitomizing effortless coolness.Meanwhile, Orhan Awatramani, also known as Orry, sported a personalized 'You Only Love Orry' t-shirt, showcasing his unique style at the event. With his trademark pose, Orry stood facing the opposite direction, hands poised in his signature gesture. While Orry is recognized for his playful poses with celebrities, Salman Khan seemed to humorously distance himself from the action, adding a lighthearted touch to the occasion.The lavish pre-wedding festivities of Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant unfolded at Reliance Greens in Jamnagar, Gujarat, spanning from March 1 to March 3. A constellation of stars from Bollywood, including Shah Rukh Khan , Salman Khan, Aamir Khan , Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt , and others, graced the occasion with their presence, adding glamour to the celebration.A standout moment of the bash featured Salman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, and Aamir Khan's lively performance during the sangeet night. They danced to their classic hits and the energetic track "Naatu Naatu" from the movie RRR. Additionally, international pop sensation Rihanna delivered a breathtaking concert on the opening night, while Diljit Dosanjh set the stage ablaze the following day.
Article Summary:
Check out the photo here:Amid viral video of Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant with 20 security cars at Dubai mall; Salman Khan, Orry, Shikhar Pahariya and others arrive in Jamnagar for Anant's birthday bashSalman Khan and Orry posed for a photo together at Anant Ambani 's birthday celebration in Jamnagar .
However, Salman appeared to avoid mimicking Orry's signature pose during the photo op.An Instagram fan page unveiled an exclusive snapshot from the recent birthday festivities of Anant Ambani in Jamnagar, Gujarat.
With his trademark pose, Orry stood facing the opposite direction, hands poised in his signature gesture.
A constellation of stars from Bollywood, including Shah Rukh Khan , Salman Khan, Aamir Khan , Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt , and others, graced the occasion with their presence, adding glamour to the celebration.A standout moment of the bash featured Salman Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, and Aamir Khan's lively performance during the sangeet night.
Additionally, international pop sensation Rihanna delivered a breathtaking concert on the opening night, while Diljit Dosanjh set the stage ablaze the following day.

Article Title: Maruti Suzuki adds new assembly line at Manesar plant: Increases production capacity to 9 lakh units per annum
Article Text:
Audi Ice Drive Drifting on a frozen lake!| TOI Auto

India's larger automaker Maruti Suzuki India today announced that it has commissioned another vehicle assembly line at its Manesar facility. This assembly line has been added to existing Plant-A of the 3 manufacturing plants at Manesar. This new vehicle assembly line can manufacture 1 lakh units per annum. With this additional assembly line, the total manufacturing capability at Manesar stands at 9 lakh vehicles per annum.The Manesar facility has contributed over 95 lakh units in Maruti Suzuki’s Crore production milestone.Several best-selling vehicles like Brezza, Ertiga , XL6, Wagon R, Dzire, S-Presso, Ciaz and Celerio are manufactured at this facility. The Manesar facility was inaugurated in February 2007 with the start of Plant A. As customer demand increased, the Company added Plant-B in 2011 and Plant-C in 2013.Speaking at the commissioning of the new assembly line, Mr. Hisashi Takeuchi, Managing Director & CEO, Maruti Suzuki India Limited said, “Maruti Suzuki is deeply committed to the Government of India’s vision of `Make in India’. We aim to nearly double our capacity to 4 million vehicles per annum over the next 7-8 years and this capacity addition of 100,000 vehicles per year is a step towards this goal. It will help us serve our customers faster and enhance our overall capability to manufacture up to 23.5 lakh units per annum.” Mr. Takeuchi added, “This new assembly line adopts technologies that enhance human ergonomics, improve productivity and enhance traceability.”In other news, Maruti Suzuki is getting ready to launch the next-generation Maruti Swift and Dzire. Both cars were recently spotted testing under heavy camouflage. The new Swift and Dzire will be based on the same platform and will feature similar styling cues. Both are expected to be launched in the Indian market in the second half of 2024.The new Swift and Dzire will boast a newly developed 1.2-litre, 3-cyl petrol engine paired with a 5-speed manual or an AMT. This new engine codenamed Z12 will replace the 1.2-litre, 4-cyl K-series Petrol engine.
Article Summary:
Audi Ice Drive Drifting on a frozen lake!| TOI AutoIndia's larger automaker Maruti Suzuki India today announced that it has commissioned another vehicle assembly line at its Manesar facility.
This assembly line has been added to existing Plant-A of the 3 manufacturing plants at Manesar.
This new vehicle assembly line can manufacture 1 lakh units per annum.
The Manesar facility was inaugurated in February 2007 with the start of Plant A.
As customer demand increased, the Company added Plant-B in 2011 and Plant-C in 2013.Speaking at the commissioning of the new assembly line, Mr. Hisashi Takeuchi, Managing Director & CEO, Maruti Suzuki India Limited said, “Maruti Suzuki is deeply committed to the Government of India’s vision of `Make in India’.

Article Title: Body of missing Indian student from Hyderabad found at a lake in Cleveland, US, father suspects murder
Article Text: HYDERABAD: The body of an Indian student from Hyderabad Mohammed Abdul Arfath,who went missing in Cleveland, Ohio, in the US, was found at Lake Erie in Cleveland on April 8. Arfath had spoken to his family last on March 7 after visiting a supermarket.Arfath’s father, Saleem, a resident of Nacharam in Hyderabad told TOI that he did not believe that his son could take his own life.“He did not have any problems. I suspect that his death is due to unnatural causes, which could be murder,” Saleem said. He said the family was waiting for the post-mortem to be conducted on the body. “We expect the post-mortem to give us some indication as to how he died,” another family member said.On April 9, the family got a call from the Consulate General of India (CGI), New York informing them that Arfath’s body had been found at a lake. The CGI had earlier informed the family that they had taken it up with the local police in Cleveland to search for the missing Arfath.The 25-year-old Arfath went to the US and joined the Cleveland State University to pursue his masters in IT.Social worker and MBT leader Amjed Ullah Khan who spoke with Saleem and his family, and also his relatives in the US said, a jogger had found a bag containing a laptop near Lake Erie on March 13. He had informed the Lake Shore police about it. However, on learning that the Cleveland police were looking for a missing person, he informed the Cleveland police who came to the lake and carried out a search. “The body was found 5 km away from where the bag was found..
Article Summary:
HYDERABAD: The body of an Indian student from Hyderabad Mohammed Abdul Arfath,who went missing in Cleveland, Ohio, in the US, was found at Lake Erie in Cleveland on April 8.
I suspect that his death is due to unnatural causes, which could be murder,” Saleem said.
He said the family was waiting for the post-mortem to be conducted on the body.
He had informed the Lake Shore police about it.
However, on learning that the Cleveland police were looking for a missing person, he informed the Cleveland police who came to the lake and carried out a search.

Article Title: Paytm Payments Bank's MD, CEO Surinder Chawla resigns
Article Text:
(With agency inputs)

NEW DELHI: Paytm Payments Bank's managing director and CEO Surinder Chawla resigned from the company, as per a regulatory filing on Tuesday. Chawla's resignation coincides with Paytm Payments Bank facing regulatory action from the RBI.In a regulatory filing, Paytm's brand owner One97 Communications said, "Surinder Chawla, Managing Director and CEO of PPBL has tendered his resignation on April 8, 2024, on account of personal reasons and to explore better career prospects.He will be relieved from PPBL w.e.f. close of business hours on June 26, 2024, unless changed by mutual consent,"Chawla assumed his role at PPBL in January last year. Prior to that, he held the position of head of branch banking at RBL Bank. Chawla has also worked with organisations such as HDFC Bank, Standard Chartered Bank, among others.This development follows Paytm Payments Bank halting basic banking services nearly a month ago under directives from the RBI.Additionally, the fintech firm headquartered in Noida disclosed to the exchanges that Paytm has terminated all ties with PPBL. Furthermore, the bank's board has been reconstituted, now comprising five independent directors along with an independent chairperson.
Article Summary:
(With agency inputs)NEW DELHI: Paytm Payments Bank's managing director and CEO Surinder Chawla resigned from the company, as per a regulatory filing on Tuesday.
Chawla's resignation coincides with Paytm Payments Bank facing regulatory action from the RBI.In a regulatory filing, Paytm's brand owner One97 Communications said, "Surinder Chawla, Managing Director and CEO of PPBL has tendered his resignation on April 8, 2024, on account of personal reasons and to explore better career prospects.He will be relieved from PPBL w.e.f.
close of business hours on June 26, 2024, unless changed by mutual consent,"Chawla assumed his role at PPBL in January last year.
Chawla has also worked with organisations such as HDFC Bank, Standard Chartered Bank, among others.This development follows Paytm Payments Bank halting basic banking services nearly a month ago under directives from the RBI.Additionally, the fintech firm headquartered in Noida disclosed to the exchanges that Paytm has terminated all ties with PPBL.
Furthermore, the bank's board has been reconstituted, now comprising five independent directors along with an independent chairperson.

Article Title: Splitsvilla 15 host Sunny Leone celebrates 13th wedding anniversary with hubby Daniel Weber; writes ‘I hope we continue this path hand-in-hand’
Article Text:
Sunny Leone on Splitsvilla X5 ExSqueeze Me Please, co-host Tanuj Virwani & handling rude contestants

Splitsvilla 15 host Sunny Leone is celebrating her wedding anniversary on April 9 with husband Daniel Weber , expressing heartfelt sentiments online. Sharing a heartfelt message, she expressed gratitude for their journey together and hoped for continued companionship. Their enduring bond serves as a beacon of love and commitment, inspiring fans worldwide.Sharing a photo from their wedding day, Sunny wrote, “We made a commitment in front of God and promised to be together not only in the good times but the really bad ones as well.God has blessed us and our family with so much love! And I hope we continue this path hand in hand forever baby love @dirrty99 Happy Anniversary!”Sunny and Daniel have been married since 2011 and completed 13 years of togetherness.Sunny is currently hosting Splitsvilla 15 and recently he made an interesting revelation about her ex-fiancé and how Daniel entered her life. She said, “I was in a relationship with a guy and we got engaged. Two months before the relationship I realised that something was just off and it was as he was cheating on me. I asked him if he loves me anymore and he said no, I don’t. The dress was picked and everything was decided for our destination wedding in Hawaii.”She further praised her now husband Daniel and said, “However, whatever happens, happens for the good. God sent me an angel just 7 months post-that and that Angel is my husband. He took care of me when my mother died. He took care of my when my father died. He really is the best so sometimes whatever happens, happens for the good.”Sunny Leone and Daniel Weber are parents to a girl Nisha, who they adopted in 2017and in 2018 they welcomed twin boys through surrogacy, who they named Asher and Noah.
Article Summary:
Sunny Leone on Splitsvilla X5 ExSqueeze Me Please, co-host Tanuj Virwani & handling rude contestantsSplitsvilla 15 host Sunny Leone is celebrating her wedding anniversary on April 9 with husband Daniel Weber , expressing heartfelt sentiments online.
Sharing a heartfelt message, she expressed gratitude for their journey together and hoped for continued companionship.
Two months before the relationship I realised that something was just off and it was as he was cheating on me.
The dress was picked and everything was decided for our destination wedding in Hawaii.”She further praised her now husband Daniel and said, “However, whatever happens, happens for the good.
He really is the best so sometimes whatever happens, happens for the good.”Sunny Leone and Daniel Weber are parents to a girl Nisha, who they adopted in 2017and in 2018 they welcomed twin boys through surrogacy, who they named Asher and Noah.

Article Title: WBJEE admit card 2024 on April 18 at wbjeeb.nic.in; Check details here
Article Text:
WBJEE

Admit Card

2024:

Integrity and Fair Practices

The West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations Board is gearing up to issue the WBJEE 2024 admit card on April 18, a pivotal milestone for all registered candidates. Set to take place on April 28, the WBJEE 2024 exam serves as the gateway to engineering, technology, pharmacy, and architecture courses across various esteemed institutions in West Bengal.With two papers – Mathematics and Physics/Chemistry – candidates must navigate through two distinct shifts, Paper 1 from 11 am to 1 pm and Paper 2 from 2 pm to 4 pm.It is important for candidates to have a printed copy of the WBJEE admit card , accompanied by a coloured photograph and valid photo identity proof such as Aadhaar card or passport. In adherence to examination regulations, candidates are strictly prohibited from carrying any written materials, calculators, or electronic devices into the examination hall.The Board underscores the severe consequences awaiting candidates caught engaging in unfair practices during the examination, emphasizing the importance of integrity and honesty. Furthermore, the WBJEE extends eligibility to candidates from a diverse range of educational boards , recognizing 75 such boards for admission consideration. Even candidates from non-listed boards have the opportunity to apply, with admission decisions subject to the discretion of the respective universities.
Article Summary:
WBJEEAdmit Card2024:Integrity and Fair PracticesThe West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations Board is gearing up to issue the WBJEE 2024 admit card on April 18, a pivotal milestone for all registered candidates.
Set to take place on April 28, the WBJEE 2024 exam serves as the gateway to engineering, technology, pharmacy, and architecture courses across various esteemed institutions in West Bengal.With two papers – Mathematics and Physics/Chemistry – candidates must navigate through two distinct shifts, Paper 1 from 11 am to 1 pm and Paper 2 from 2 pm to 4 pm.It is important for candidates to have a printed copy of the WBJEE admit card , accompanied by a coloured photograph and valid photo identity proof such as Aadhaar card or passport.
In adherence to examination regulations, candidates are strictly prohibited from carrying any written materials, calculators, or electronic devices into the examination hall.The Board underscores the severe consequences awaiting candidates caught engaging in unfair practices during the examination, emphasizing the importance of integrity and honesty.
Furthermore, the WBJEE extends eligibility to candidates from a diverse range of educational boards , recognizing 75 such boards for admission consideration.
Even candidates from non-listed boards have the opportunity to apply, with admission decisions subject to the discretion of the respective universities.

Article Title: Google takes on Microsoft GitHub’s Copilot with its new tool for developers, Code Assist
Article Text:
Key Features of Gemini Code Assist

Unmatched Context:

Customization:

Broader Codebase Support:

Enhanced Knowledge Base:

Google is set to take on Microsoft Microsoft GitHub ’s Copilot. The company today (April 9) introduced Gemini Code Assist at its Cloud Next conference. This enterprise-focused tool leverages AI to provide code completion and assistance to developers. This might sound familiar because Google offered a similar service called Duet AI, which became generally available in late 2023.However, Google hinted at transitioning the service to its Gemini platform. Code Assist builds upon Duet AI and offers significant upgrades.Improved Functionality: Code Assist will be available as plugins for popular editors like VS Code and JetBrains. It directly competes with GitHub's Copilot Enterprise, offering several advantages.Code Assist boasts a massive 1 million-token context window, the largest in the industry. This allows it to analyze a broader codebase, resulting in more accurate suggestions and the ability to modify larger code sections.Similar to GitHub Enterprise, Code Assist can be fine-tuned based on a company's internal codebase. Early results from companies like Turing indicate a significant improvement in code completion and generation quality. (This feature is currently in preview.)Unlike competitors, Code Assist functions with various code repositories, including on-premises solutions, GitLab, GitHub, and BitBucket. It can also handle codebases split across different services.Google is partnering with companies like Stack Overflow, Datadog, and others to integrate their knowledge bases into Gemini, providing developers with a richer information pool.Beyond Code AssistIn addition to Code Assist, Google also announced CodeGemma, a new open model within the Gemma family specifically fine-tuned for code generation and assistance. CodeGemma is now available through Vertex AI.
Article Summary:
Key Features of Gemini Code AssistUnmatched Context:Customization:Broader Codebase Support:Enhanced Knowledge Base:Google is set to take on Microsoft Microsoft GitHub ’s Copilot.
The company today (April 9) introduced Gemini Code Assist at its Cloud Next conference.
This enterprise-focused tool leverages AI to provide code completion and assistance to developers.
Code Assist builds upon Duet AI and offers significant upgrades.Improved Functionality: Code Assist will be available as plugins for popular editors like VS Code and JetBrains.
)Unlike competitors, Code Assist functions with various code repositories, including on-premises solutions, GitLab, GitHub, and BitBucket.
